name: my-app-name
description: App for Single Parents to connect

scripts.installglobals: npm i -g bower gulp cordova ionic tsd@next karma-cli protractor node-gyp coffee-script js-beautify typescript npm-check parse-dashboard mongodb-runner playup json browser-sync@2.12.12 nodemon
scripts.dashboard-dev: parse-dashboard --serverURL "$(json -f config.json dev.serverUrl)$(json -f config.json parseMount)" --appId $(json -f config.json parseAppId) --masterKey $(json -f config.json parseMasterKey)
scripts.dashboard-qa: parse-dashboard --serverURL "$(json -f config.json qa.serverUrl)$(json -f config.json parseMount)" --appId $(json -f config.json parseAppId) --masterKey $(json -f config.json parseMasterKey)
scripts.dashboard-prod: parse-dashboard --serverURL "$(json -f config.json prod.serverUrl)$(json -f config.json parseMount)" --appId $(json -f config.json parseAppId) --masterKey $(json -f config.json parseMasterKey)
